message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a little steep for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I'm getting closer to your target price, Bob! I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
